Name: Band with inscription
Description: Cartonnage. Long band, placed on the legs of a mummy, with a column of text containing a prayer to Osiris for daily offerings on behalf of the singer of Ptah Aset-em-kheb daughter of Ta-kha-Kas. On each side of the column of text are depictions of eight mummiform gods. The two upper pairs are the four canopic gods. The style of the representations and the names point to the Ptolemaic Period.
